Text:
This seems to have a specific audio profile not compatible to most media players, i had only tried it on a computer. 

Apologies - this is how i found it, i normally test on HDD media player, otherwise would have re-encoded it before upping.

I'll re-encode with more compatible audio and up in next day or so. Until then, this does play on PC with VLC, and WMP with k-lite codecs
